title.en: Dungeon Elf - Dungeon ni Takarabako ga Aru no wa Atarimae desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンエルフ ダンジョンに宝箱があるのは当たり前ですか?

altTitles.en: Dungeon Elf - Is It Normal for There to Be Treasure Chests in Dungeons?

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon Elf - Dungeon ni Takarabako ga Aru no ha Atarimae desu ka?

altTitles.vi: Elf Ngực Bự Và Kho Báu Hầm Ngục

description.en:
A mystery that not even the most devoted RPG enthusiast can answer - why are there conveniently placed treasure chests in dungeons? 

In the thickets of the Forest of Beginnings, a perilous place where even a party of heroes must face the possibility of total annihilation. Sometimes even within ordinary homes. Unbeknownst to all but the adventurers themselves, the treasure chests are always there, quietly aiding them in maintaining the balance of the world.

This is the untold, unnoticed tale of someone burdened with a treasure chest.
___
Made by GyroKnuckle and Tomozo under the group name [River Slan](https://mangadex.org/author/1e179cfa-adca-4dcd-8247-23fa22e80a9e).
description.ja:
どんなRPG愛好家でも答えられない謎。なぜダンジョンには都合よく宝箱があるのか？　

はじまりの森の草むら。勇者一行でも全滅を覚悟する死地。ときには、民家の中にまで。人知れず冒険者を助け、世界の均衡を保つため、宝箱はいつもそこにある──。これは、誰も知らない、気にしない。

宝箱を背負った、誰かの物語。
description.vi: Ai là người đã đặt kho báu trong hầm ngục? Chính là một Elf ngực bự!

biography.en:
**Name In Native Language:** リバー・スラン

A group consisting of [GyroKnuckle](https://mangadex.org/author/8f0e7a54-2853-47e9-9fe3-ca8505175d8b/gyro-knuckle) in charge of writing and [Tomozo](https://mangadex.org/author/06807b9d-e259-4aac-967e-ea5847bff9b8/tomozo) in charge of drawing.

Created [Dungeon Elf](https://mangadex.org/title/d57ceb17-3831-42ab-b42e-1ce1a7029285/dungeon-elf-dungeon-ni-takarabako-ga-aru-no-wa-atarimae-desu-ka).
**Name In Native Language:** ジャイロナックル

**Name In Native Language:** ともぞ

Character designer for [I Think I'll Cheat to Become a Spellsword in Another World](https://mangadex.org/title/9c4f1b25-c224-4346-990a-f18c77f4ab9e).

**Name In Native Language:** リバー・スラン

A group consisting of [GyroKnuckle](https://mangadex.org/author/8f0e7a54-2853-47e9-9fe3-ca8505175d8b/gyro-knuckle) in charge of writing and [Tomozo](https://mangadex.org/author/06807b9d-e259-4aac-967e-ea5847bff9b8/tomozo) in charge of drawing.

Created [Dungeon Elf](https://mangadex.org/title/d57ceb17-3831-42ab-b42e-1ce1a7029285/dungeon-elf-dungeon-ni-takarabako-ga-aru-no-wa-atarimae-desu-ka).
